name: getPaymentsForPayoutV4
description: Get List of payments for Payout, allowing for RETURNED status

railsId.description:
Payout Rails ID filter - case insensitive match.
Any value is allowed, but you should use one of the supported railsId values.
To get this list of values, you should call the 'Get Supported Rails' endpoint.

remoteId.description: The remote id of the payees.

remoteSystemId.description: The id of the remote system that is orchestrating payments

sourceAmountFrom.description: The source amount from range filter. Filters for sourceAmount >= sourceAmountFrom

sourceAmountTo.description: The source amount to range filter. Filters for sourceAmount ⇐ sourceAmountTo

paymentAmountFrom.description: The payment amount from range filter. Filters for paymentAmount >= paymentAmountFrom

paymentAmountTo.description: The payment amount to range filter. Filters for paymentAmount ⇐ paymentAmountTo

submittedDateFrom.description: The submitted date from range filter. Format is yyyy-MM-dd.

submittedDateTo.description: The submitted date to range filter. Format is yyyy-MM-dd.

transmissionType.description:
Transmission Type
* ACH
* SAME_DAY_ACH
* WIRE
* GACHO

pageSize.description: The number of results to return in a page

sort.description:
List of sort fields (e.g. ?sort=submittedDateTime:asc,status:asc). Default is sort by remoteId
The supported sort fields are: sourceAmount, sourceCurrency, paymentAmount, paymentCurrency,
routingNumber, accountNumber, remoteId, submittedDateTime and status

sensitive.description:
Optional. If omitted or set to false, any Personal Identifiable Information (PII) values are returned masked.
If set to true, and you have permission, the PII values will be returned as their original unmasked values.

$ul: **content**
**links**
**page**
**numberOfElements**
**page**
**pageSize**
**totalElements**
**totalPages**
**summary**
**confirmedPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have been confirmed.
**incompletePayments**: The count of payments within the payout which are incomplete.
**instructed**: Details of principal participating in a payout.
**principal**: Email address if principal is a user or ID if application.
**principalId**: The id of the principal.
**instructedDateTime**: The date/time at which the payout was instructed.
**payoutFrom**: Details of payor and principal participating in a payout.
**dbaName**: The alternate name of the payor.
**payorId**: The id of the payor.
**payorName**: The name of the payor.
**principal**: Email address if principal is a user or ID if application.
**principalId**: The id of the principal.
**payoutMemo**: The memo attached to the payout.
**payoutStatus**: Current status of the Payout. One of the following values: ACCEPTED, REJECTED, SUBMITTED, QUOTED, INSTRUCTED, COMPLETED, INCOMPLETE, CONFIRMED, WITHDRAWN
**payoutTo**: Details of payor and principal participating in a payout.
**dbaName**: The alternate name of the payor.
**payorId**: The id of the payor.
**payorName**: The name of the payor.
**principal**: Email address if principal is a user or ID if application.
**principalId**: The id of the principal.
**payoutType**: The type of payout. One of the following values: STANDARD, AS, ON_BEHALF_OF
**quoted**: Details of principal participating in a payout.
**principal**: Email address if principal is a user or ID if application.
**principalId**: The id of the principal.
**quotedDateTime**: The date/time at which the payout was quoted.
**releasedPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have been released.
**returnedPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have been returned.
**schedule**: Details relating to a payout that was executed via a schedule or is still waiting to be executed
**notificationsEnabled**
**scheduleStatus**: Current status of the payout schedule. One of the following values: SCHEDULED, EXECUTED, FAILED
**scheduledAt**
**scheduledBy**: Optional display name as a hint for who scheduled the payout. Not populated if payout was scheduled by an application.
**scheduledByPrincipalId**: ID of the user or application that scheduled the payout
**scheduledFor**
**submittedDateTime**: The date/time at which the payout was submitted.
**submitting**: Details of payor and principal participating in a payout.
**dbaName**: The alternate name of the payor.
**payorId**: The id of the payor.
**payorName**: The name of the payor.
**principal**: Email address if principal is a user or ID if application.
**principalId**: The id of the principal.
**totalPayments**: The count of payments within the payout.
**withdrawn**: Details of principal participating in a payout.
**principal**: Email address if principal is a user or ID if application.
**principalId**: The id of the principal.
**withdrawnDateTime**
**withdrawnPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have been withdrawn.
**correlationId**: a unique identifier to track a request or related sequence of requests
**errors**: one or more errors
**httpStatusCode**: this will mirror the Status-Code part of the Status-Line http response header and is included for extra clarity
